task.title: Undock View
task.shortdesc: Disconnect or "undock" a view from the Session Editor, making it its own separate window.

taskbody.context: From the Session Editor window, with the view you wish to undock open:

step.cmd: In the top right corner of the view, click the button that looks like a window with an outward arrow (on mouseover it will say Disconnects this panel from the frame). Alternately, select the title bar of the view and press CTRL+E.
step.stepresult: The view will appear as a separate window in front of the Session Editor.

step.cmd: To move the view while it is undocked, click and drag on the small bar centred above the title bar. To resize the view, click and drag on any other edge or corner.
step.stepresult: The view will retain its undocked size and position when you exit and reopen Phon.
